comment.author: 15088225@N07
comment._content: Beautifully sharp viewed original size. What a tragic story.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/imagegallery] It's a great image isn't it? I particularly like the woman waving her hat with the water spurting out, lower right. Watch this space, there's more photographs from the same day still to come!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/imagegallery] Also, if you're interested in reading more about the tragic story of SS CERAMIC, feel free to search the library's catalogue: 974.sydneyplus.com/netopac/ANMM/portal.aspx
